rationale: This species has a wide distribution, with no known major widespread threats. It is therefore listed as Least Concern. It has also been assessed regionally as Least Concern for central and western Africa. In northern Africa it has been reported from Mauritania. No more information is known. More information is needed on the species distribution and status and thus it has been categorised as Data Deficient regionally.
assessor: Azeroual, A., Lalèyè, P., Moelants, T. & Olaosebikan, B.D.
evaluator: Snoeks, J., Tweddle, D., Getahun, A., Lalèyè, P., Paugy, D., Zaiss, R., Fishar, M.R.A & Brooks, E.
